DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate antibody persistence 1 , 3 & 5 year post-fourth dose ( i.e. , 2 , 4 & 6 year age , respectively ) subject vaccinate previous study . This protocol post deal objective & outcome measure extension phase year 1 , 3 5 . The objective & outcome measure first four dos present separate protocol posting ( NCT00129129 ) . This protocol post amend order comply FDA Amendment Act September 26 , 2007 .
